tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Ranju Raj is a very good doctor who guides and helps us ,he is our paediatrician since my daughter was born and she is 10 years now , he is very patient , explains the issue very well and suggests good treatment no unwanted investigations 
Thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Great Relief!!! I would highly recommend Doctor Ranju as he is the best Pediatrician i had visited till the time. My Daughter is 3 and half years old and for last 4 months she was having Fever, Cough and Cold as a routine and we were much worried as my kid was having difficulty to sleep as well due to continuous Cough during Sleep.I had visited more than 5 Doctors and didn't got any remedy.

Doctor Ranju is well experienced and he had listened patiently about baby's health and recommended few antibiotics which is really a game changer for my kid. She is really active now and having no such complaints.
He is so caring and does the health check of the kid regularly over the chat as well. 

Am really thankful to Doctor Ranju Sir.
reply_text:
Very happy to know that baby is doing fine 
Thanking you for the kind words!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We usually visit the doctor for my twin kids frequent health issues like fever,cold and vaccination etc., One thing I am very pleased about the doctor is he is very concerned about his patients and keeps a very close follow up with prompt responses. He explains each and everything with patiently and diagnose the disease and provide medication appropriately. We feel very free talking to the doctor which will be missing in most of the other doctors. And he is reachable in mobile for any type of emergency assistance.Thank You Sir for the beyond assistance and care that you are giving to your patients. I think you are well deserved for this feedback from my heart. We strongly recommend our family and friends. Thank You so much sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ****** ** **** ************* ****** *** I found extremely helpful after consulting him.  He has so much patience to listen to my queries and address all of them very clearly. Treatment wise it's too good and he made my baby problem resolved within two days. Without his proper guidance and treatment , it's not possible at all. I owe him a huge thanks and gratitude for helping us out during this pandemic situation. Out of my own interest I am sharing this feedback because I just wanna cascade my experience to the folks here so that they can also consult him and get their problems resolved at ease. Once again, Thank you so much Sir.
